summary: Replaces the vanilla Novice- Master robes with new models/textures.
descriptionHtml:
Sixth mod! (I think?) 

So... the mage robes in skyrim? They're alright, I guess... but after a while it's time for a different, more elegant look. 
Which means putting a dress on, naturally. 

This mod replaces the Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert and Master robes and hoods for all schools of magic with robe meshes/textures from the vanilla game that were used elsewhere or not implemented. The way I decided to do it was like this: 

Novice: Blue 
Apprentice: Green 
Adept: Brown 
Expert: Grey 
Master: Black  

Please do not upload this file elsewhere without my permission. 

Credits: 
BorderWise (not a cross dresser... at least that's what he says) 
Bethesda, for making the game that has nice shiny spell effects. 

Version 1.0: 
Changed the meshes of Novice/Apprentice/Adept/Expert/Master robes and Novice/Apprentice/Adept Hoods.

Russian Translation here: http://tes-game.ru/load/skyrim/bronja_i_odezhda/alternativnye_roby_magov/39-1-0-9019
author: BorderWise
